Question: What time do I go to bed on 2015-09-16 Wednesday?
Solution: Query the database with the function <<detect_first_time>> using activity ((sleeping)) and date [[2015-09-16 Wednesday]].
Explanation: The question asks for the concrete start time, thus we can query the database with the function <<detect_first_time>> to obtain the first time that the user did some activity. The question specifically asks for the first time of going to bed, thus we can query the function <<detect_first_time>> using activity ((sleeping)). The question also asks for the concrete start time on [[2015-09-16 Wednesday]], thus we can query the function <<detect_first_time>> using the date [[2015-09-16 Wednesday]].
